scripts.build-original: espruino --board PUCKJS --config PRETOKENISE=true --config MINIFICATION_LEVEL=ESPRIMA -m -o dist/original-ntag.js src/original-ntag/app.js
scripts.build-refactor: espruino --board PUCKJS --config PRETOKENISE=true --config MINIFICATION_LEVEL=ESPRIMA -m -o dist/refactored-ntag215.js src/refactored-ntag215/app.js
